hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that you can Boomerang items that are freestanding Heart Pieces in the unrandomized game?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Treasure Box Shop#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
